title: Hamam / Steam / Det turkiska badet
description:
<a href="http://akas.imdb.com/title/tt0119248/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://akas.imdb.com/title/tt0119248/</a>


Spoken languages: Italian AND turkish.


Francesco and Marta are husband and wife running a small design company in Rome. When Francesco\&#039;s long forgotten Aunt Anita dies in Istanbul, he travels there to look after the sale of the hamam (one of a few traditional Turkish baths left) he inherited. There he meets the family running the hamam, gets attracted to a member of it and the whole Turkish atmosphere and decides not to sell the hamam..
